description: Premium of the insured group of persons

premiumRiskRate.description: Premium risk rate in ‰. Premium rates are always specified as a percentage in the format xxx.yyyyy. Note for insurers: A premium rate of 0.5‰ is displayed as 0.05%.

costAdminRate.description: Costs admin rate in ‰. Cost admin rates are always specified as a percentage in the format xxx.yyyyy. Note for insurers: A premium rate of 0.5‰ is displayed as 0.05%.

sharingCostRate.description: Sharing costs  rate in ‰. Sharing cost rates are always specified as a percentage in the format xxx.yyyyy. Note for insurers: A premium rate of 0.5‰ is displayed as 0.05%.

accidentPreventionContributionRate.description: Accident prevention contribution in ‰. Prevention rates are always specified as a percentage in the format xxx.yyyyy. Note for insurers: A premium rate of 0.5‰ is displayed as 0.05%.

finalPremiumRate.description: Final premium rate in ‰. Corresponds to the final premium rate / gross premium rate. Premium rates are always specified as a percentage in the format xxx.yyyyy. Note for insurers: A premium rate of 0.5‰ is displayed as 0.05%.
